entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cassiar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -20.2°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
